text: Rasoul Yunan (, born 1969 in a village near Urmia Lake, West Azerbaijan) is an Iranian poet of Iranian Azerbaijani descent. He is primarily a Persian poet but is also a translator and writer of Persian literature and Azerbaijani literature both. His genre includes playwright, short story, dastan and modern poetry. ==References== * * * * Category:1969 births Category:People from Urmia Category:Iranian Azerbaijani writers Category:Living people Category:Iranian Azerbaijani poets Category:Azerbaijani-language poets Category:Iranian male novelists Category:Iranian novelists Category:Iranian dramatists and playwrights Category:Iranian male short story writers Category:Iranian translators Category:Persian-language poets Category:Persian-language writers
title: Rasoul Yunan
